channel.title: Interface thing, help anyone?~ Help! ~~ urgent! important!@@@@

item.title: Interface thing, help anyone?~ Help! ~~ urgent! important!@@@@
item.dc:creator: @r1ch_kid r1ch kid
item.description:
@r1ch_kid wrote:

add this

if (command.startsWith("train")) { writetrain(); }

then add this

public void Writetrain() { showInterface(986); }

then search for case 185: and under

switch(actionButtonId) {

add the action button id for the click to continue which is the case number
example:

case ####: teleportToX = 2730; teleportToY = 9774; RemoveAllWindows(); break; }

Read full topic
item.source: Interface thing, help anyone?~ Help! ~~ urgent! important!@@@@

item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

Er, the interface cant come up in the chatbox, unless you want the NpcDialogue box? If so, add a NpcDialogue and all that crap, then in your command add
NpcWanneTalk = #;

item.title: Interface thing, help anyone?~ Help! ~~ urgent! important!@@@@
item.dc:creator: @_R_E_B_O_R_N ~R E B O R N~
item.description:
@_R_E_B_O_R_N wrote:

Ok well i im trying to make a command that wants you tele to somewhere by doing ::train that a little interface pops up in the chatbox and you have to “click here to continue” or something… this is all i have:

if (command.startsWith("train")) { teleportToX = 2730; teleportToY = 9774; showInterface(986); } but im not sure how to make the interface say what i want it to say or what ever.
~Edited something~ oh yea how do i make it so the interface shows up in the chatbox?
help!? no one ever helps me when i need it atm…

Read full topic
